de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.semantics
Class PredicativeRepresentation

java.lang.Object
  de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.semantics.PredicativeRepresentation

public class PredicativeRepresentation
extends java.lang.Object

PredicativeRepresentation class is a class representing the link between the Sense instance and the SemanticPredicate instances.

Author:
Zijad Maksuti

Constructor Detail

PredicativeRepresentation

public PredicativeRepresentation()
Method Detail

getPredicate

public SemanticPredicate getPredicate()
Returns the SemanticPredicate pointed by this PredicativeRepresentation instance.

Returns:
the semantic predicate pointed by this predicative representation or null if the predicate is not set.

Note that UBY-LMF requres that all instances of PredicativeRepresentation class should have the semantic predicate attribute set. Absence of this attribute may indicate to incomplete conversion process of the original resource.

setPredicate

public void setPredicate(SemanticPredicate predicate)
Sets the SemanticPredicate pointed by this PredicativeRepresentation instance.

Parameters:
predicate - the semantic predicate pointed by this predicative representation to set

Note that UBY-LMF requres that all instances of PredicativeRepresentation class should have the semantic predicate attribute set.
